sen.j: 観光地として名高い嵯峨野、「三尾」（さんび）と称される高雄、槇尾（まきのお）、栂尾（とがのお）地区は当区に属し、区内には妙心寺、仁和寺、龍安寺、広隆寺、天龍寺、大覚寺、神護寺、高山寺、愛宕神社などの著名社寺が多い。
sen.e: It includes the Sagano district which is a famous sightseeing spot, and the Takao, Makinoo and Toganoo districts which are called 'Sanbi' (literary, "three bi (named after their Chinese characters)"), and there are many famous temples and shrines such as Myoshin-ji Temple, Ninna-ji Temple, Ryoan-ji Temple, Koryu-ji Temple, Tenryu-ji Temple, Daikaku-ji Temple, Zingo-ji Temple, Kozan-ji Temple and Atago-jinja shrine.
